Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Saya merasa lelah setelah bekerja sepanjang hari.
English Translation: I feel tired after working all day.

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Tasnya ringan dan mudah dibawa.
English Translation: The bag is light and easy to carry.

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Acara tersebut akan disiarkan langsung di televisi.
English Translation: The event will be broadcasted live on TV.

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Kerjasama yang baik hanya bisa dicapai melalui pengertian saling menghargai.
English Translation: Good cooperation can only be achieved through mutual understanding and respect.

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Mari kita bersama-sama berusaha untuk selamatkan bumi kita.
English Translation: Let's work together to save our planet.

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Dia tahu cara memuaskan nafsu pelanggannya.
English Translation: He knows how to satisfy his customers' desires.

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Pernahkah kamu mengunjungi kebun binatang di sini sebelumnya?
English Translation: Have you ever visited the zoo here before?

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Izinkan saya untuk memperkenalkan diri, nama saya adalah Andi.
English Translation: Allow me to introduce myself, my name is Andi.

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Pemuda-pemudi di masa kini memiliki banyak peluang untuk berprestasi.
English Translation: Today's youth have many opportunities to achieve excellence.

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Tidak ada yang suka dipaksa, mari kita berbicara dengan cara yang lebih baik.
English Translation: No one likes coercion, let's talk in a better way.

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Dalam dunia bisnis, memiliki jaringan yang luas sangat penting.
English Translation: In the business world, having a wide network is very important.

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Saya membeli kenang-kenangan untuk keluarga ketika berada di sana.
English Translation: I bought souvenirs for my family when I was there.

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Kabar burung itu menyebar dengan cepat di lingkungan sekitar.
English Translation: The rumor spread quickly in the surrounding community.

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Jangan-jangan mereka sudah tiba di sana sebelum kita.
English Translation: Perhaps they have already arrived there before us.

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Mereka selalu memperhatikan kenyamanan para tamu.
English Translation: They always pay attention to the comfort of their guests.

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Tolong beritahu saya jika ada informasi lebih lanjut.
English Translation: Please inform me if there is further information.

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Dia tidak suka menerima kesalahan dari bawahannya.
English Translation: He doesn't like receiving mistakes from his subordinates.

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Saya ingin belajar bahasa Inggris secara lengkap dan terstruktur.
English Translation: I want to learn English completely and structurally.

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Tolong berikan resep sup ayammu yang enak itu.
English Translation: Please give me your recipe for that delicious chicken soup.

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Ayo lakukanlah apa yang kamu inginkan, jangan ragu!
English Translation: Come on, do what you want, don't hesitate!
